text: We’ll here arguments next in 72-1125 Allee against Medrano.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the Court.
Mr. Chief Justice and if the Court please.
Do you agree that we take the facts as found by the District Court here since state of Texas has have challenged the fact finding?

Your Honor, we don’t agree with all of some what we might call editorializing but as far as the findings of fact can say they were largely undisputed and we have no particularly quarrel with the facts.
